text:
@realDonaldTrump One of your core demographics is older white males without a uni degree. They tend to plumpness, and may well have blood sugar, BP, or heart issues. 

Prime potential COVID-19 victims!

Why are you trying to kill off one of the cohorts most likely to vote for you?

#DonaldTrump
